buchungskalender-veroeffentlichen.intro: Whether you have your own website or not - with Bookingflix you can easily and flexibly offer your customers online appointment booking. Either via a small embed code that you insert on your website or via a separate booking website. Everything is generated automatically. Individual customisation is possible at any time.

infos.headline: Embedding in your website
infos.text: If you already have your own website, you can integrate the Bookingflix booking widget into it using HTML code. In your account you will find the step-by-step instructions as well as further hints in our support area.

infos.headline: Customizable design
infos.text: To make the booking widget fit seamlessly into your website, customize its color scheme to match your corporate colors.

infos.headline: Manage online appointments - even without your own website
infos.text: If you don't have your own website, you can easily create a micropage with Bookingflix on which your customers can book appointments.

infos.headline: Free design options
infos.text: With our page builder it is possible to configure your booking website individually. Add headings, texts and images according to your needs and adjust the colors to your company. Best of all, you don't need to know how to program! And if you do get stuck, our support will be happy to help you.

infos.headline: GDPR compliant and secure
infos.text: We help you to create a secure web presence that complies with the GDPR regulations. The imprint, the GTCs and the privacy information are automatically obtained from your Bookingflix profile.
